title: Joni (footballer)
text:
Osvaldo Roque Gonçalves da Cruz (born March 25, 1970 in <a href="Luanda">Luanda</a>), nicknamed Joni, is a retired <a href="Angola">Angola</a>n <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Midfielder%20%28association%20football%29">midfielder</a>.
International career.
Joni has been a member of his <a href="Angola%20national%20football%20team">national team</a>, and was called up to the <a href="1996%20African%20Cup%20of%20Nations">1996 African Cup of Nations</a>.
